mainBoard.name: Hakoda, Selfless Commander

rulings.text: If the top card of your library changes while you're casting a spell, playing a land, activating an ability, or taking a special action, you can't look at the new top card until you finish doing so. This means that if you cast a spell from the top of your library, you can't look at the next one until you're done paying for that spell.

You can look at the top card of your library whenever you want (with one restriction; see below), even if you don't have priority. This action doesn't use the stack. Knowing what that card is becomes part of the information you have access to, just like you can look at the cards in your hand.
You must pay all costs and follow all timing rules for spells cast from the top of your library this way.

mainBoard.text:
Vigilance
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast Ally spells from the top of your library.
Sacrifice Hakoda: Creatures you control get +0/+5 and gain indestructible until end of turn.

{T}: Aggiungi {W} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: バーシンセーの聖域の壁の外にはつつましやかな土の王国の村々があり、どうかあと一日だけでも戦争の知らせが届かぬように、と願っている。
foreignData.name: 興隆する荒野
foreignData.text:
この土地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、白でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{W}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: Más allá de la protección de las murallas de Ba Sing Se, los humildes poblados del Reino de la Tierra tenían la esperanza de mantener a raya las noticias de la guerra durante un día más.
foreignData.name: Brezal floreciente
foreignData.text:
Esta tierra entra girada. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea blanco.
{T}: Agrega {W} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Heath
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
